# NSViewControllerPresentationAnimator

**Protocol**

A set of methods that let you define animations to play when transitioning between two view controllers.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol NSViewControllerPresentationAnimator : NSObjectProtocol
```

## Overview

Implement this protocol only if you want to provide custom animations. You might find what you need in the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSViewController/TransitionOptions] enumeration, which provides many predefined animations.

A class that adopts this protocol is responsible for both presenting and dismissing a view controller.

## Animating Presentation and Dismissal of View Controllers

- **animatePresentation(of:from:)**: Called when the specified view controller is about to be presented.
- **animateDismissal(of:from:)**: Called when a previously-presented view controller is about to be dismissed.

## Inherits From

- NSObjectProtocol
